item.title: Arabesque - Hello Mr.Monkey
item.description:
Hello hello
Mr. Monkey
You’re still
so fast and funky
Hello hello
Mr. Monkey
You should have
been a clown

so famous

of old clown
Everybody used to
know his name
Now he’s nameless
But happy old guy
The children laugh
If only he was by
